name: git-init

options.-q, --quiet: Only print error and warning messages.
<directory>: If provided, the command is run inside it. If this directory
does not exist it will be created.

long_desc: This command creates an empty Git repository - basically a .git
directory with subdirectories for objects, refs/heads, refs/tags,
Running 'git init' in an existing repository is safe. It will not
overwrite things that are already there.
